results.content: I was looking for a good nestjs course and I found this course easy to follow for me because I know Angular as you know nest is very similar to Angular. I suggest you before taking this course study Angular. Before studying Angular study about typescript so if you follow this path Typescript > Angular > Nestjs would be great for you. Thanks the instructor for this lovely course
